parameters.name: path_p
parameters.description: The path that you want to get the ACL for.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of ACL; this must currently be ACL_TYPE_ACCESS.

full_content:
Function: acl_get_file
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_get_file.html
Synopsis: acl_t acl_get_file( const char *path_p,
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - path_p: The path that you want to get the ACL for.
  - type: The type of ACL; this must currently be ACL_TYPE_ACCESS.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

acl_t acl_get_file( const char *path_p,
                    acl_type_t type );
